channel.title: The Dyer Laboratory
channel.description: Research on the spatial distribution of population and landscape genetic variation.

item.title: geneticstudio
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: iOS and MacOS stand-alone application for the maintenance, archiving, analysis, and communication of landscape and population genetic data.

item.title: PopulationGraphs
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: Visualization software for population graph structures.

item.title: DLabGenetic Swift Package
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package for the analyiss of marker and SNP relevant data types for landscape and population genetic analyses on the iOS and MacOS platforms.

item.title: DLabMatrix Swift Package
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package with matrix algebraic objects and functions necessary for landscape and population genetic analyses on the iOS and MacOS platforms.

item.title: DLabSpatial Swift Package
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: A swift library package for the analysis and display of spatial data for analytical software targeting iOS and MacOS platforms.

item.title: popgraph R Library Package
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: An R package for estimation, anslysis, and visualization of Population Graph objects after Dyer & Nason (2014).

item.title: gstudio R Library Package
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: An R package designed to allow the analysis of population genetic data as a native R data type, fully integrated with tidy data paradigms.
